extension.name: Papyrus activity editor Plugin Standard Palette

constraints.constraint: self.incoming->isEmpty() An initial node has no incoming edge An initial node must have no incoming edge
not self.source.oclIsKindOf(InitialNode) Only control edges can have initial nodes as source Source of an object flow must not be an initial node
self.outgoing->isEmpty() A fianl node has no outgoing edge A final node must have no outgoing edge
self.isControl implies self.isControlType Control pins have a control type isControl muts imply isControlType for pins.

self.outgoing.target->forAll(inStructuredNode=self.owner) Input pins may have outgoing edges only when they are on actions that are structured nodes, and these edges must target a node contained by the structured node. Input pins may have outgoing edges only when they are on actions that are structured nodes, and these edges must target a node contained by the structured node.

(not self.fromAction.oclIsUndefined()) implies self.fromAction.output->size() = 1 The fromAction of an action input pin must have exactly one output pin. The fromAction of an action input pin must have exactly one output pin.

(not self.fromAction.oclIsUndefined()) implies self.fromAction.input->forAll(oclIsKindOf(ActionInputPin)) The fromAction of an action input pin must only have action input pins as input pins. The fromAction of an action input pin must only have action input pins as input pins.

(not self.fromAction.oclIsUndefined()) implies (self.fromAction.incoming->isEmpty() and self.fromAction.outgoing->isEmpty() and self.fromAction.input->forAll(incoming->isEmpty() and outgoing->isEmpty()) and self.fromAction.output->forAll(incoming->isEmpty() and outgoing->isEmpty())) The fromAction of an action input pin cannot have control or data flows coming into or out of it or its pins. The fromAction of an action input pin cannot have control or data flows coming into or out of it or its pins.

constraint.name: validateCompatibleType
constraint.description: The type of value specification must be compatible with the type of the value pin.
constraint.message: The type of value specification must be compatible with the type of the value pin.

constraints.constraint: self.incoming->isEmpty() Value pins have no incoming edges. Value pins have no incoming edges.

self.incoming.source->forAll(inStructuredNode=self.owner) Output pins may have incoming edges only when they are on actions that are structured nodes, and these edges may not target a node contained by the structured node. Output pins may have incoming edges only when they are on actions that are structured nodes, and these edges may not target a node contained by the structured node.

constraint.name: validateSourceAndTarget
constraint.description: The source and target of an edge must be in the same activity as the edge.
constraint.message: The source and target of an edge must be in the same activity as the edge.

constraints.constraint: self.owner.oclIsKindOf(Activity) or self.owner.oclIsKindOf(ActivityGroup) Activity edges may be owned only by activities or groups. Activity edges may be owned only by activities or groups.
true -- constraint is checked by the model structure Activity edges may be owned by at most one structured node. Activity edges may be owned by at most one structured node.

-- This constraint is implemented separately for not being in live mode. -- Other constraints have been relaxed to supprot null source and target not self.source.oclIsUndefined() and not self.target.oclIsUndefined() The source and target of an edge must be defined. The source and target of an edge must be defined.

(self.source.oclIsUndefined() or not self.source.oclIsKindOf(Action)) and (self.target.oclIsUndefined() or not self.target.oclIsKindOf(Action)) Object flows may not have actions at either end. You can not link an action with an object flow

constraint.name: validateCompatibleTypes
constraint.description: Object nodes connected by an object flow, with optionally intervening control nodes, must have compatible types. In particular, the downstream object node type must be the same or a supertype of the upstream object node type
constraint.message: The object flow must link object nodes with compatible types (target type must be a supertype of the source type).

constraint.name: validateSameUpperBounds
constraint.description: Object nodes connected by an object flow, with optionally intervening control nodes, must have the same upper bounds.
constraint.message: The object flow must link object nodes with the same upper bounds.

constraint.name: validateTarget
constraint.description: An edge with constant weight may not target an object node, or lead to an object node downstream with no intervening actions, that has an upper bound less than the weight.
constraint.message: The target object node's upper bounds must be less than the object flow weight

constraint.name: validateTransformationBehaviour
constraint.description: A transformation behavior has one input parameter and one output parameter. The input parameter must be the same as or a supertype of the type of object token coming from the source end. The output parameter must be the same or a subtype of the type of object token expected downstream. The behavior cannot have side effects.
constraint.message: A transformation behavior has one input parameter and one output parameter. The input parameter must be the same as or a supertype of the type of object token coming from the source end. The output parameter must be the same or a subtype of the type of object token expected downstream. The behavior cannot have side effects.

constraints.constraint: (not self.selection.oclIsUndefined()) implies self.source.oclIsKindOf(ObjectNode) An object flow may have a selection behavior only if it has an object node as a source. Selection behavior is authorized only when the object flow's source is an object node.

constraint.name: validateInputAndOutputParameter
constraint.description: A selection behavior has one input parameter and one output parameter. The input parameter must be a bag of elements of the same as or a supertype of the type of source object node. The output parameter must be the same or a subtype of the type of source object node. The behavior cannot have side effects.
constraint.message: A selection behavior has one input parameter and one output parameter. The input parameter must be a bag of elements of the same as or a supertype of the type of source object node. The output parameter must be the same or a subtype of the type of source object node. The behavior cannot have side effects.

constraints.constraint: self.isMulticast implies not self.isMultireceive isMulticast and isMultireceive cannot both be true. isMulticast and isMultireceive cannot both be true.

(self.source.oclIsUndefined() or (self.source.oclIsKindOf(ObjectNode) implies self.source.oclAsType(ObjectNode).isControlType) ) and (self.target.oclIsUndefined() or (self.target.oclIsKindOf(ObjectNode) implies self.target.oclAsType(ObjectNode).isControlType) ) Control flows may not have object nodes at either end, except for object nodes with control type You can not link an object node with a control flow (except if its control type is true).

extension.category: Validate that Pin and corresponding Parameter are correctly synchronized

constraint.name: PinAndParameterSynchronizer
constraint.description: Action's Pins and invoked object's Parameters are synchronized
constraint.message: Action's Pins must correspond to the called object's Parameters
